  <htmlform> 
   <!-- Autogenerated example form  (template from 01-Nov-2010 --> 
   <macros>
     paperFormId = (Fill this in) headerColor =#009d8e fontOnHeaderColor = white 
   </macros> 
   <script type="text/javascript">
// on window load set the hiv test results dropdown box to not show unless
// the hiv test checkbox has been clicked.
 window.addEventListener('load', function() {

    // hide the test results dropdown on page load
    document.getElementById('hiv-test-results').parentNode.style.display = 'none';

    // when the checkbox is clicked show the test results selection box
    // hide it when unchecked.
    var onCheckBoxChange = function(event){
        var checkbox = event.target;
        var test_results_td = document.getElementById('hiv-test-results');
        var test_results_section = test_results_td.parentNode;
        if (checkbox.checked) {
            // show test results dropdown box.
            test_results_section.style.display = "";
        } else {
            // find the selection box.
            // reset the value to null incase the user made a selection.
            test_results_td.nextElementSibling.children[0].value = "";
            // hide dropdown box.
            test_results_section.style.display = "none";
        }
    };

    // get the hiv test done td element and find the checkbox child
    // you can't select the textbox directly as it is generated on the server.
    var td = document.getElementById('hiv-test-done');
    var td_children = td.children;
    for (var index in td_children) {
        if(td_children[index].type === 'checkbox'){
            // add the event listener to the checkbox
            var checkbox = td_children[index];
            checkbox.addEventListener('change', onCheckBoxChange, false);
            break;
        }
    }
});
</script> 
   <style>
        .section {
            border: 1px solid $headerColor;
            padding: 2px;
            text-align: left;
            margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .sectionHeader {
            background-color: $headerColor;
            color: $fontOnHeaderColor;
            display: block;
            padding: 2px;
            font-weight: bold;
        }
        table.baseline-aligned td {
            vertical-align: baseline;
        }
    </style> 
   <span style="float:right">Paper Form ID: $paperFormId</span> 
   <h2>Labour and Delivery Form (v1)</h2> 
   <section headerlabel="Encounter Details"> 
    <script type="text/javascript">
        	$j(document).ready(function(){
				<ifMode mode="ENTER">
					$j("#date_div_showed").append($j("#date_div_hidden").find("input").clone().val());
					$j("#location_div_showed").append($j("#location_div_hidden").find("select option:selected").clone().text());
					$j("#provider_div_showed").append($j("#provider_div_hidden").find("select option:selected").clone().text());
				</ifMode>
				<ifMode mode="EDIT">
					$j("#date_div_showed").append($j("#date_div_hidden").find("input").clone().val());
					$j("#location_div_showed").append($j("#location_div_hidden").find("select option:selected").clone().text());
					$j("#provider_div_showed").append($j("#provider_div_hidden").find("select option:selected").clone().text());
				</ifMode>
				<ifMode mode="VIEW">
					$j("#date_div_showed").append($j("#date_div_hidden").find("span").clone().text());
					$j("#location_div_showed").append($j("#location_div_hidden").find("span").clone().text());
					$j("#provider_div_showed").append($j("#provider_div_hidden").find("span").clone().text());
				</ifMode>
				$j("#location_div_hidden").hide();
				$j("#provider_div_hidden").hide();
				$j("#date_div_hidden").hide();
				//$j("#table_encounterDetails").find("input").attr("disabled",true);
				//$j("#table_encounterDetails").find("select").attr("disabled",true);
			});
        </script>
